landing.heroDesc1: Simply getting answers right isn't enough.
landing.heroDesc2: Sentence-by-sentence translations, detailed vocabulary breakdowns, and wrong answer notes.
landing.heroDesc4: the most reliable path to passing.
landing.feature1Desc: "Why is this sentence translated this way?" Stop using translators. We provide accurate translations and grammar points for every sentence in questions and examples.
landing.feature2Desc: Don't look up every unknown word. We automatically organize and display key vocabulary, readings, and meanings from each problem.
landing.feature3Desc: Wrong answers are saved automatically. Not just saved—we send reminders based on the forgetting curve so you can review at the right time. Focus on your weak grammar and vocabulary types.
landing.feature3More: Learn more about Wrong Answer Notes
landing.pricingDesc: Choose the path to passing at a reasonable price.
landing.basicDesc: For those who want to casually check their skills
landing.appDesc1: Mock exam results sync in real-time with the app.
landing.appDesc2: Review your wrong answer notes on your commute.

practice.desc1: Even just one problem a day.
practice.tip: Tip: Mock Exam is a timed mode where you take all sections continuously.

exam.title: Mock Exam
exam.desc1: Same time limits and environment as the real test.
exam.desc2: Get the most accurate prediction of your passing chances.
exam.warningDesc: Mock exams cannot be paused. Like the real test,
exam.warningEnd: are taken continuously. We recommend starting when you have enough time.
